Well, why are yoh complaining?

Waiter, Sun's using mobile again!

Seriously? he/she/it's not even in your soup, why'd you call me? >:-[

Run!

Waiter, my forum avatar is in my soup!

uhh sir i think you dropped your phone in the soup while it is showing my little pony sir

I dunno.

Waiter, there's a black hole in my soup!

Sounds like a recipe for fun! Maybe I'll put one extra in it.

Waiter, a few SSTO's decided they could land in my soup.

No.

No. }:-[

...well alright...

I'll get you a new soup 100% mud-free :-3

radio

Waiter, there's a dead bird in my soup.

You ordered chicken soup. You think we'd put a live bird in that!?

Waiter, Overfloater decided to SSTO my soup!

Wow, sure enough, sir. They said he could get anything to orbit without dropping a stage, and by Jove, they're right. I'll go make you some more soup, sir; unless, of course, you want to try to convince the Overfloater to launch you into space next...

Waiter! My soup is frozen solid and is absorbing all the heat from its surroundings without even melting!

Wow, sure enough, sir. They said he could get anything to orbit without dropping a stage, and by Jove, they're right. I'll go make you some more soup, sir; unless, of course, you want to try to convince the Overfloater to launch you into space next...

Waiter! My soup is frozen solid and is absorbing all the heat from its surroundings without even melting!

It's a heat sink soup, use it in deserts or fusion powered vehicles. But standing next to it for too long will kill you.

Waiter, there is a Beamng.drive in my soup!

Oh, look at that, it made a hole in you. Too bad you didn't tell me earlier.

wut?

There's a soup in my soup.

Yes, you ordered that soup.

Yes, you ordered that soup.

You got rickrolled!

I think they traveled with a time machine.

My apologies! Don't worry I'll go prepare a new soup and put better MLP episodes in it! :-3

Well you see we have a new chef and he isn't that good with chopping up the onions that went in it too.

Sorry, i'ts a kerbal soup, silly.
